channel.title: CVE Feed for crewjam -- saml
channel.description: The latest CVEs for crewjam -- saml

item.title: CVE-2022-41912|2024-08-03T12:56:38.465Z -- crewjam -- saml
item.description: The crewjam/saml go library prior to version 0.4.9 is vulnerable to an authentication bypass when processing SAML responses containing multiple Assertion elements. This issue has been corrected in version 0.4.9. There are no workarounds other than upgrading to a fixed version.
